scripts.load:local: npm run build:load && npx artillery run ./load/local.yml
scripts.load:public: npm run build:load && npx artillery run ./load/public.yml
scripts.load:server: npm run build:load && npx artillery run ./load/server.yml
scripts.load:env:public: npm run build:load && cross-env TARGET_URL=https://the-internet.herokuapp.com npx artillery run ./load/env.yml
scripts.load:env:local: npm run build:load && cross-env TARGET_URL=http://localhost:3000 npx artillery run ./load/env.yml
scripts.load:public:report: npm run build:load && npx artillery run ./load/public.yml --output ./load/report-public.json
